object.reproducer:
smbclient "//<NETAPP DFS SHARE" -W ADB -U "ADB\\<username>%<password>" smb: \> cd <\allowed directory\>
It now fails with errors, see bug #description.
object.summary: After patching to samba-client-4.2.4-16.1.x86_64.rpm it is not possible to connect to a NetApp Filer (NetApp's network attached storage using CIFS).
